org.koreaderhistfavparser

Class KOReaderHistFav

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.koreaderhistfavparser.KOReaderHistFav

  • public class KOReaderHistFav
extends java.lang.Object
    The class for KOReader history and favorites management.

    • Constructor Detail

      • KOReaderHistFav

        public KOReaderHistFav()
                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Constructs a new KOReaderHistFav. Searches in external storage and external SD card storage for the settings directory with the name koreader.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if KOReader settings directory not found

      • KOReaderHistFav

        public KOReaderHistFav(java.lang.String koreaderDirectoryPath)
                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Constructs a new KOReaderHistFav from given settings directory.
        Parameters:
        koreaderDirectoryPath - the koreader directory path
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if KOReader settings directory not found

      • addBookToFavorites

        public java.lang.Boolean addBookToFavorites(java.lang.String filePath)
        Add book to favorites (and library). If book already in favorites, move book to first position.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the book's file path
        Returns:
        true if successfully, otherwise false

      • addBookToHistory

        public java.lang.Boolean addBookToHistory(java.lang.String filePath)
        Add book to history (and library). If book already in history, move book to first position. Sets book's last reading time to current time.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the book's file path
        Returns:
        true if successfully, otherwise false

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if successfully, otherwise false

        Returns:

      • uniqueFilePath

        static java.lang.String uniqueFilePath(java.lang.String filePath)
        Return a unique file path string for the given file path using canonical path and unification by external storage path (necessary for some devices, see Android disambiguating file path. The external storage path can be set by setExternalStoragePath(java.lang.String) and is returned by getExternalStoragePath(). It defaults to /storage/emulated/0.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the file path
        Returns:
        the unique file path
